channel.title: What I am Doing Now :: Linux Reader
channel.description: This is a page to help me stay focused and keep track of what I am doing. It is also to show others what I am currently working on and thinking about. Credit goes to Derek Sivers for starting a “Now” page movement. Read about “Now” pages here. Updated: 02-20-2025 Career I am currently a Linux System Administrator. I just passed the RHCSA exam today! Check out my RHCSA Notes. Not sure what I’m going to learn next. May just play around in Linux for a while.
